document.full_text: in the most damning official u.s. report yet produced on wall street's role in the financial crisis, a senate panel accused powerhouse goldman sachs of misleading clients and manipulating markets, while also condemning greed, weak regulation and conflicts of interest throughout the financial system.
document.title: senate panel slams goldman in scathing crisis report
lines_and_colors: in the most damning official u.s. report yet produced on wall street's role in the financial crisis, a senate panel accused powerhouse goldman sachs of misleading clients and manipulating markets, while also condemning greed, weak regulation and conflicts of interest throughout the financial system.
